ISSUE.TITLE: awx cli schedule command is missing the human friendly job_template option
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY The awx cli `schedule` is missing the `--job_template` argument. This should take the friendly *name* of the Job template/workflow and not the identifier like `--unified_job_template` does. Example: ```shell # For Job Template awx schedules create --name 'My awesome schedule' --job_template 'My awesome job template' --rrule 'DTSTART:20191010T143904Z RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=1;COUNT=1' # For Workflow Template awx schedules create --name 'My awesome schedule' --job_template 'My awesome workflow template' --rrule 'DTSTART:20191010T143904Z RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=1;COUNT=1' ```
